extendedInfo.description: See The World LIVE - Presented by EarthCam!Live views from popular tourist destinations and much more! Check out famous landmarks and even your favorite animals from all over the world!Available Now, EarthCam's fully loaded App that includes exclusive streaming video cameras with audio and advanced search.

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Worked yesterday but not today. Maybe from over use trying to view east coast
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot see any live cams
reviews.comment: It appears all live web cams are PAID VERSION ONLY. If you want people to buy you need yo provide a sample of what earth cam can do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It is a waste of time
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work at all...couldn\'t even get one camera to work. I uninstalled it.  Sure its free but don\'t waste my time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works.
reviews.comment: (No streaming cams with free version.) But landscape mode stretches and distorts the image. Please fix. Also, please allow pinch zoom.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No HD on Xoom2
reviews.comment: On my Motorola xoom 2 no hd cam works. All throw in an error. Pitty.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ZOSIMO
reviews.comment: when I read the below messages on this message board, I suspected that the EC app was not going to work and be useable. Well, I installed it today and it works just fine! my phone is a Samsung Intercept. -\'lets roll\'
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Most of the cams don\'t work and the ones that do are so small and grainy, I can\'t even tell what I\'m looking at. Uninstalling now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Just photos...shows daylight shots when its night time. Hillarious
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works good on my Droid Inc. I\'d upgrade for a one-time flat cost, but certainly NOT giving my card and allowing a monthly charge!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: do not install
reviews.comment: Since I download this app it never open. I crashes on opening.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes non stop
reviews.comment: Consistently crashes all the time as soon as you open a feed. Seems like its still shots only, cant say if it streams  video or not. What a shame...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can not load most. With error, can not load image. However works on iPhone but with galaxy x android... does not work well. Need lots of work here.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Total Waste of Download
reviews.comment: Not worth getting if none of the cameras will work and load at the same time. Needs SUPER MAJOR works done
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not impressed...force closes alot and most of the cams are offline or wouldn\'t even load...alot are just still images...don\'t bother with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Their website is better than this
reviews.comment: This was installed for some time, but a lot of cameras, including the most interesting ones always returned the error \"could not load image\". I kept this here for as far as 5 months or so, the problem was still there. They promise what they can\'t deliver, that\'s bad...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beta version? Step it up Earthcam
reviews.comment: no live feed, just pictures that are taken about every half hour. Then there is a button which gives you the option to share the picture, save it or share the location, none of which actually which actually work..It almost leads me to believe that it was a Beta version...Step it up Earthcam.
reviews.author: John De Castro

reviews.title: Horrible app
reviews.comment: I used to love watching the myrtle beach boardwalk cam, and never had problems viewing it from the webpage. Now that it\'s moved to this app, not only does that cam NOT work at all - most of the other cameras in the app either don\'t work at all\' or aren\'t streaming. What a shame - I won\'t pay for the ninety nine cent app if the free one doesn\'t work. Wish they would move that web cam back to the webpage !!!!
reviews.author: Eleanor Hall

reviews.comment: No live streaming, lot of links don\'t work. Spy cam much better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes all the time.
reviews.comment: You see the location of the cam you want to look at and when you select it - nada.  It crashes and you get a popup that says the program stopped unexpectedly.  If you need to use a paid version, as others have mentioned, this is a poor way of doing it.  So long earth cam, I wont be back.
reviews.author: Richard Timbo

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: This does work on my Asus tablet but annoyingly very intermittently!! Some days it\'s brilliant but more often it just displays a still (but very clear) picture. This is the free version but the paid one I believe is no different. Really good to watch Times Square hustle & bustle!! When it works!
reviews.author: Shelagh Palmer
